message: Let's start fair, I take 90% and you get 10%.  I'm sure we can find a better deal for both of us in later rounds.
Let's be reasonable. I'll take a bit more, but I'm willing to share. We can both get more if we agree now.
I think a 50/50 split is the fairest option.  We can keep arguing, but the money will only keep shrinking. Let's be practical and end this now.
